title: Current status for the skin splash art update?@Riot
body: There was a list posted by Moonboy65 2months ago, but how about now, are there any plans added after that?

replies.body: Well they are working hard on the VGUs for Warwick and Galio, but here and there we will also see separate art for Twitch and Karma, but it sounds like we won't see Twitch till after Warwick is at least done.

Maaaayyybeee. There is a chance we see Twitch before Warwick. Only time will tell ;)

There are also 2 "off the list" splashes that should be out before Twitchs, similar to the Teemo one. I'll let them be a surprise though.

How do these "off the list" splashes get decided? Loved the Spellthief Lux one, it was fantastic.

Lots of reasons. Sometimes they are passion projects by Rioters that work on them in there own time. Sometimes they are splashes that were used as a test to see if we want to use someone as a splash art outsourcer in the future. If the art test is good enough we might finish it up in house.

These 2 coming up in particular were 2 of the last splashes we couldn't resolve during the global unification process and needed to be done from scratch. Cottontail Teemo was one of these as well.

Unlikely. Especially now that his update has been out for a few weeks already. :P

But seriously, they don't do Traditional skins anymore because it's a lot of resources for something that they, with the champion updates, are seeking to support in a general sense.
They do, however, intend to keep making features that honor the old designs, in certain ways (usually lines, such as Sion's "I'll be back" Recall quote, Poppy's "Jokes? Yeah, I know jokes" Joke line, Yorick's "Remember my name. For one day, I will not" and many more- Even things like the infamous, old Lolipoppy splash by referencing it in the new Lolipoppy splash and very recently Candy King Ivern's splash).
